  • Paint is up!

    Nov 24, 2015 — Hayden Elza

    Today we worked on painting. We finished one coat on the ends and the bottom portion of the hoops. Painting the plywood protects it from the elements while painting the hoops protects against the covering plastic from becoming brittle due to direct contact with the PVC hoops.

    We also started digging the trenches for the fish reservoirs. The goals is to dig them five feet deep which is going to take...

  • Welcome to Jekyll!

    Oct 10, 2015

    You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

    To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary...

Elza Homestead

We are a family homestead based business specializing in local and sustainable food production. All of our produce is grown using natural and organic methods, we never use chemicals of any kind!
